p: Shannon index and Simpson diversity index firstly significantly increased and then significantly decreased and Pielou evenness index decreased gradually with the increasing of extract concentrations ( P < 0.05) ( Fig 4). Shannon index, Pielou evenness index and Simpson diversity index reached lowest values at 10 mgÂ·mL -1 extract, decreasing by 10.74%, 2.24% and 1.80% as compared to control, respectively ( P < 0.05).
